section.SSBody:
Unfortunately, we have reached our maximum capacity, and registrations will now be placed on our waitlist. If you register, we will notify you if additional positions become available.

Come join the Gunn HS Robotics Team this summer to enjoy a thrilling and valuable robotics experience! Campers will collaborate to build and code a fully-functioning VEX IQ robot to complete and complete challenges while learning the fundamental skills for being an engineer.

When and where is it?The summer camp will be held from 8:30am to 3pm on June 11-15, 2018, at the Gunn HS Robotics Lab (L-5) at Gunn High School.

Who is the camp for?The summer camp is designed for campers from rising 5th graders to rising 8th graders.

Should I donate to the camp?We recommend a donation of $350 to cover material costs and snacks. To donate, please mail a check addressed to "GRT Booster" to Gunn Robotics Team, 780 Arastradero Road, Palo Alto, CA 94306. Contact us at gunnrobotics192@gmail.com for scholarship information.

When should I register my camper?If you would like to attend, please register by the end of the day on Friday, May 25, 2018. If you have registered online, you will receive a confirmation email shortly after. If you have registered by mail, you will receive a confirmation email once your form is accepted.

Who are the counselors?Our adult mentors will be present to supervise the summer camp. The counselors running the camp and teaching the course material are current students on the Gunn HS Robotics Team! All of our counselors are enthusiastic and eager to teach, and are all trained in the coding and assembly of VEX IQ robotics.

Will food be provided?We ask that your child bring their own lunch and reusable water bottle, but snacks will be provided throughout the day.

I have other questions, who should I ask?If you have other questions, please contact us at gunnrobotics192@gmail.com.
